description:
🔊 Bristolian MLOps Community

📅 Save the date

Looking forward to our fifth Bristol Meetup!

Talk 1: Serverless architecture for MLOps from [Paul Hetherington](https://www.linkedin.com/in/paul-hetherington/)

*An overview of a multi model, multi environment, distributed computing architecture with heterogeneous GPUs.*

Talk 2: Stay Fresh Cheese Bags: strategies for dealing with model drift in MLOps from [Thorben Louw](https://www.linkedin.com/in/thorbenlouw/) and [Brian Mason](https://www.linkedin.com/in/brian-mason-3844534/)

As usual 🍻 and 🍕 and a trip to the pub afterward.

See you all soon!
title: MLOps Bristol - Meetup #5
